net.grabsalot.business

Class RuleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.grabsalot.business.RuleSet

  • public abstract class RuleSet
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class that holds and manager rules.

    • Method Detail

      • getRules

        public static Rule[] getRules()
        Returns an array of all currently applied rules.
        Returns:
        and array of Rule objects

      • resetRules

        public static Rule[] resetRules()
        Reloads all rules. Useful to call when rules have been changed.
        Returns:
        an array of the reloaded Rule objects

      • getRule

        public static Rule getRule(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a single rule determined by name. May return null if the rule was not found.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Rule to load. Possible values on RuleSet.
        Returns:
        the rule matching name or null.
